definition: to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: Shut up or I'll crown you.
sentences.chinese: 住口，要不我就砸爛你的腦袋。

sentences.english: For a moment, he withholds, mouth full of pause…
sentences.chinese: 一瞬間，他忍住口胤中的千言萬語。

sentences.english: No. Unless you shut up, I'll tell Mom the truth.
sentences.chinese: 不懂，如果你不住口，我就對媽媽說實話了。

sentences.english: Bind the sack before it be full.
sentences.chinese: 袋子裝得過滿便扎不住口。

sentences.english: He caught himself before saying the wrong thing.
sentences.chinese: 他及時住口才沒有把話說錯。

sentences.english: Protect airways from smoke with damp clothes or shirts.
sentences.chinese: 用溼布或溼襯衫蓋住口鼻翼方吸入毒煙。

sentences.english: Shut up, go with your bag.
As this is done the cloth is lowered until it covers both the nose and the mouth.
sentences.chinese: 在這個過程中，把布逐漸降低，直到蓋住口鼻。

sentences.english: Unless you shut up, I'll tell Mom the truth.
sentences.chinese: 不懂，如果你不住口，我就對媽媽說實話了。

definition: to shout at sb to stop
to desist/to stop/to stay one's hand
to berate/to excoriate/to chide/also written 呵斥[he1 chi4]
(of yamen bailiffs etc) to walk ahead of an official, shouting at pedestrians to clear the way
to suddenly change color showing displeasure, bewilderment etc
to glower (at sb)/to cast an angry look
Shut up!/same as 閉上嘴巴|闭上嘴巴
to berate/to excoriate/to chide/also written 喝斥[he1 chi4]
scowling in anger/rage written across one's face
